title: Arts & Crafts Week Flyer
content:
Need name of font if possible. Thank you in advance.

author: scraplete

comments.content: And also available from P22 as: P22 Arts And Crafts

Agree with Bob's suggestions.  
I note that your image refers to a pdf. If you have the pdf, open it and check document properties. One of the tabs will be fonts. Click on it and it will say precisely what fonts are embedded in the pdf.  
Don
Semiramis was issued in 1997 so that is most likely it.
